name: Valueset_cyclosporine_exclude
title: Exclude cyclosporine Medications Value Set
description: ValueSet containing drug identifiers to exclude. Criteria is explicitly stating ophthalmic formulations.
purpose: To refine valueset for Digoxin + Cyclosporine PDDI-CDS
